statements.select: SELECT s.ShoppingCartId as CartId, s.ShoppingCartItemId as CartItemId, s.ProductId as ProductId, s.ItemCount as ItemCount, p.ProductName as ProductName, p.ProductDescription as ProductDescription, p.Price as Price FROM ShoppingCartItem s, OTCProduct p WHERE s.ProductId = p.OTCProductId AND s.ShoppingCartId = #cartId#;
SELECT count('x') as TotalItems, sum(p.Price) as TotalPrice FROM ShoppingCartItem s, OTCProduct p WHERE s.ProductId = p.OTCProductId AND s.ShoppingCartId = #cartId# group by s.ShoppingCartId;
statements.insert: INSERT INTO ShoppingCart (iisSessionId) VALUES (#SessionId#) SELECT @@IDENTITY AS Id
